name: Scoot Boot Shoot
description:
Controls:

  • Hold "Space Bar" to power up.
  • Release "Space Bar" to run towards the bullet.
  • Press "Space Bar" to angle your shot.

Credits:

  • Game Design:   Sean Walsh and Elijah Dixson
  • Artist:   Sean Walsh
  • Programming:   Elijah Dixson
  • Music:   Sean Walsh
  • Sound Effects:   Brian Flaherty

Dev Notes:

  • Made across 4 months working about 1 day most weeks
  • Made using Godot 3.5.1
